attributes.action: Make it law that all SMOKERS have to pay PRIVATE HEALTH INSURANCE as well as paying GOVERNMENT NATIONAL INSURANCE.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This would mean that, private health insurance schemes would fund self inflicted illnesses caused by smokers instead of the rest of the working tax/national insurance population.
JUST LIKE THEY DO IN AMERICA!!!!!!!
They should still pay into the GOVERNMENT NATIONAL INSURANCE SCHEME because their non smoking family dependents will need to use the NHS sometime throughout their lifetime.
